<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve the content of a specified file

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"conversation_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Conversation ID"},{"name":"file","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Path of the file to be retrieved"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
